controller

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Player handles input from player and holds the entity controlled by the player. Checks user input and win/lose conditions
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
